title: The 2018 version of the MacBook Air is $200 off on Amazon right now, bringing its price down to $900
text:
Flickr/Tim Trueman

The 2018 MacBook Air gave Apple's long-loved, ultra-thin MacBook line a much-needed refresh — but while an awesome product, the MacBook Air was a little pricey. Now it's getting a pretty significant discount. You can get the 2018 MacBook Air for $200 off its normal price straight from Amazon.

There are a ton of things to love about the most recent iteration of the MacBook Air. Notably, the device offers a super-classy design. It has a 13-inch display, and is only 0.61 inches thick at its thickest. It's also only 2.75 pounds — so in general the laptop is more than sleek and thin enough to take on the road. The MacBook Air is available in a few different colors too — including Gold, Silver, and Space Gray.

Of course, it's perhaps what's under the hood that's a little more important. In the MacBook Air, you'll get an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 128GB of storage, though you can upgrade the device to offer 256GB of storage if you so choose.

There are other features to note too. Around the edges of the device, you'll get two Lightning ports and a headphone jack, which isn't bad. There's also a Touch ID fingerprint sensor built right into the keyboard of the device, so you can quickly and easily authenticate your identity without having to type in a password. You can read our full review of the laptop for more information and testing notes.
description: The 2018 model of the MacBook Air is very popular, and now is the time to buy. Amazon is discounting the price by $200 for a limited time so act now.
